name: Woother
description:
The game is a 2d platformer, it was made for a class project in college.

The objective is to get to the end of the level as fast as possible. There are 3 levels with enemies and in the third level you need to win the boss fight to win the game.

The controls are in the main menu.

▼ Developed by ▼
